column5: I know what this feels like, this hollow ache  in your chest, which turns even more deeper every time someone let's me down, it sucks all the feelings out of me, I don't know what happened but now if my sister or mother are crying in front of me I don't feel anything, like seriously nothing at all. This rage, this pure white hot rage that I feel inside of me consumes me all the time, on the simplest of things, but everyone has given up on me now, and you know what even I am counting the days on my fingertips for when finally death will approach me.
